Sub-Category: Practices for transitioning towards a more sustainable economy
Tooltip: Please, describe specific practices for transitioning towards a more sustainable economy in case you have them in place.

Please disclose your total energy consumption in MWh (in the reporting period) for
- fossil fuels
- electricity as reflected in utility billings. If available distinguish between renewable and nonrenewable sources.

Please disclose your estimated gross greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions in tons of CO2 equivalents (tCO2eq) considering the content of the GHG Protocol Corporate Standard.
(a) total GHG emissions in tCO2eq
(b) the Scope 1 GHG emissions in tCO2eq (from owned or controlled sources)
(c) the Scope 2 emissions in tCO2eq (i.e., emissions from the generation of purchased energy)
(d) Scope 3 emissions, in case you can provide them
Please disclose, if applicable, the pollutants (with respective amounts in kg) you emit to air, water and soil in your own operations.
Please, provide a list of relevant company sites adjoint to key biodiversity areas (including their country, area in hectares, adjoint biodiversity area, and level of adjointness).

Please, disclose your total water withdrawal (in m^3), i.e., the amount of water drawn into the boundaries of the organisation (or facility); pay additional attention to sites located in areas of high water-stress.

If applicable, we aim to determine your water consumption (as the difference between water withdrawal and water discharge). Hence, please disclose your respective water discharge from your production processes.

Sub-Category: Resource use, circular economy and waste management
Tooltip:
In case you operate manufacturing, construction and/or packaging processes, please provide the share of recycled content in your products and packaging (in per cent based on weight, during the reporting period) For this we require the total weight  (in tons, in the reporting year) of both recycled and overall materials used in products and packaging. 

Moreover, please provide the share of recycable content in your products and packaging (in per cent based on weight, during the reporting period). For this we require the  total weight  (in tons, in the reporting year) of both recycable materials used in products and packaging.

Tooltip: Please disclose whether you have a process in place for identifying wether there are value chain workers, affected communities, or consumers and end-users who are affected or are likely to be affected by severe negative impacts in relation to the undertaking’s operations (i.e., its products, services and activities).
